"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54249526636872077aaf0100#post_54249526636872077aaf0100
No When Madara used the Mugen Tsukuyomi he also got Team 7 and everything that happend after that (Black Zetsu/Kaguya Rebellion) was the Gen-Jutsu-Illusion under which Naruto is. Naruto could only come up with such bullshit to defeat Madara, thats why he has such a shitty dream and thats why sasuke did not actually kill sakura. Everything that happening now is Nautos Fantasy. And at the end of the series we will see Naruto and Sasuke back in the village and it will shift outside of his Mind and we get to see the utopia that Madara build.


^ would actually be a satisfying ending
